title: Giannis MVP? And WWE Star Riddle Joins the Show
description:
Jalen & Jacoby discuss the big game between Giannis and Durant. Giannis and the Bucks got the best of the Nets so has Giannis now become the favorite for MVP? Why Kevin Durant’s jersey will be retired for both the Oklahoma City Thunder and Golden State Warriors. Is his Finals MVP to get his jersey hung up in the rafters? Rick Ross wants to climb Mt. Kilimanjaro. The guys break down whether that’s Cultural or Regional. And WWE’s Riddle joins the show before WrestleMania 38 in Jerry World. “RK-Bro” defending the Raw Tag Team Championship, but who is his all-time dream tag team match-up? All that and more…. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
itunes:subtitle: J&J: Big Matchup Between Giannis And KD, WWE Star Riddle Joins the Show
